title: I can't find the place to change/transfer my account to another country
body:
Hello everyone,

So, I have an account in Brazil (lvl 30) and I want to transfer it to EU West server, problem is that I can't find the place to do it. I know the place is on Store>Account, therefore I can only find the option to change my nickname. 

Hope you guys can help me. =/

replies.body: Hey, unfortunately transfers are disabled right now.  :(  There's been some technical issues that our devs have been working on, but updates are being shared [in this post ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update)in the meantime.  Hang tight!
